content: आश्चर्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आ-चर्-ण्यत् सुट् <ls>P. VI. 1. 147</ls>] Marvellous, wonderful, extraordinary, astonishing, strange, curious; आश्चर्यो गवां दोहोऽगोपेन <ls>Sk.</ls>; तदनु ववृषुः पुष्पमाश्चर्यमेघाः <ls>R. 16. 87</ls>; °दर्शनो मनुष्यलोकः <ls>Ś. 7.</ls> --र्यं {@--1@} A wonder, miracle, marvel; किमाश्चर्यं क्षारदेशे प्राणदा यमदूतिका <ls>Udb.</ls>; कर्माश्चर्याणि <ls>U. 1</ls> wonderful deeds; <ls>K. 65</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 6</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">2. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Surprise, wonder, astonishment; °मय <ls>Bg. 11. 11.</ls> {@--3@} A strange appearance, prodigy. {@--4@} (Used as an exclamation) A wonder, how strange or curious; आश्चर्यं परिपीडितो ऽभिरमते यच्चातकस्तृष्णया <ls>Chāt. 2. 4</ls>; usually with यच्च, यत्र or यदि with a following potential or future.
